list.listitem: Communion (sacrament)or Eucharist or the Lord's Supper, the Christian rite involving the eating of bread and drinking of wine, reenacting the Last SupperCommunion rite, that part of the Eucharistic rite in which the consecrated bread and wine are distributed to participants in the Catholic massCommunion (chant), the Gregorian chant that accompanies this rite
Communion (Christian), the relationship between Christians as individuals or churches
